channel.title: Sealed Kunai?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Sealed Kunai?" - Does the awesome ability "Past Connections" get me a sealed kunai every day?

item.title: Re: Sealed Kunai?
item.content:encoded:
Barring bugs, you will get a Sealed Kuani every dayroll once you reach Jonin level each season (all the bloodline awesome abilities trigger at Jonin). I say 'barring bugs' because there was a rather nasty one a while back that prevented you from getting Sealed Kunai after you looped, even after you got to Jonin.

And before anyone asks, no you do not get 2 Sealed Kunai a day if you loop to Legacy and get to Jonin.

item.title: Sealed Kunai?
item.content:encoded: So I have been saving up my awesome for a while, and I'm thinking about buying "Past Connections", but I need to know if having it will get a sealed kunai every day like the regular bloodline, or am I never going to be able to use it?
